StoryText: I'm sleeping over my friend %FullName:NPC:1%'s house and %Pron:1:1% tells me that %Pron:1:3% attic is haunted.
Question: What should we do?

OptionText.Text: Bring a Ouija Board into the attic after %FullName:NPC:1%'s parents go to sleep.
Burn incense in the attic after %FullName:NPC:1%'s parents go to bed.
Just stay in %FullName:NPC:1%'s room and go nowhere near the attic.

OptionResult.Result: We use the Ouija Board and receive the message "Get out" and we freak out and rush out but both fall down the stairs.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: After we fall down the attic stairs %FullName:NPC:1%'s parents come and check on us and get us back to bed. We are all banged up and bleeding, get a few bandages, so we're fine there. But we cannot sleep the rest of the night we are so freaked out. That is not a friendly spirit in the attic.

OptionResult.Result: We burn the incense and leave and the rest of the night is quiet.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% is so happy and keeps thanking me. %Pron:1:1% said that %Pron:1:1% had been hearing noises every night for months, this was the first quiet night. The incense must have done the trick and gotten the spirit to leave.

OptionResult.Result: During the night we hear noises above us, someone coming down the attic steps, I get so scared I wet my sleeping bag.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% found it hilarious that I wet myself but it was scary! %Pron:1:1% goes and tells a ton of our friends at school and now everyone is making fun of me and I am so mad at %Pron:1:2%. I'm never sleeping over there again!
